title: Stunt Crasher
fullContent: Home› CarStunt CrasherBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenSpeed up the car and overjump to crash into obstacles to gain a big score. The more speed you have the more points ofdestruction you will win. Play Stunt Crasher now and have fun destroy everything in the way!There are 3 cars available that you can select. There are 3 scenes available:• Stadium • Bridge • Mountain To become more powerful in destruction you can upgrade Engine, the Boost and Bonus with cash. Each one can be upgraded until level 100. After every crash you will see the score details:• Launch Speed • Distance • Destruction • Bonus Controls:W/S or up/down arrows to control car This article was updated on May 9, 20241 Player3DCarCrashCrazyDestroyDrivingFreeFunPhysicsSpeedStunt
